Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Anna Carolin Wolf at a charity gala in Berlin. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Anna Carolin Wolf is a 68 year old and comes from Germany.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Anna Carolin Wolf and Hoffmann tied the knot in 1986. Together they have 1 kid called Fischer.
Education Background:
Anna completed her secondary education at Helmut-Schmidt-Gymnasium Hamburg in 1975.
In 1979, Anna graduated from Hamburg University of Applied Sciences with a degree.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 45 years, Anna Carolin Wolf has established herself as a key player in the industry.
At RWE AG, Anna Carolin Wolf held the position of Drilling Engineer from 1980 to 1982, developing essential skills in the field.
In 1984, she moved to RWE AG to work as a Reservoir Engineer, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
At Uniper SE, she worked as a Operations Manager from 1986 to 1990, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
After 10 years of dedication, she assumed the role of VP of Exploration at Wintershall DEA GmbH in 1990, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1500000 EUR.
She owns villa in Braunschweig, where she resides. It is worth 1923000 EUR.

She purchased townhouse in Bonn, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1320000 EUR.
On top of that she inherited a beautiful condo in Gelsenkirchen, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1260000 EUR.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
